import React,{FC, useState, useEffect, useMemo} from "react" import { IRepo, Item } from "../models/models" interface ChosenItem{ chosenItem?:Item[], getRepos:(username:string)=>void, } export const ItemView:FC=({chosenItem,getRepos})=>{ const [isLoading, setIsLoading]=useState() useEffect(()=>{ setIsLoading(true) setTimeout(()=>setIsLoading(false),1000) }, [chosenItem] ) console.log(chosenItem) return <> {chosenItem? isLoading?

Loading!!!

: chosenItem.map(item=>{ return

{item.login}

getRepos()}>Fetch Repos

}) :
